# CLI commands

# Vue CLI

# Create a project:

vue create hello-world
1

# Install dependencies

npm install
1

# Run local server

npm run serve
1

# Build for production

npm run build
1

# VuePress

# Run Server

yarn docs:dev
1

localhost:8080

# Build for production

yarn docs:build
1
